title: Funny
review: A villain who is no longer a villain can stop other villains from becoming villains. He can catalyze love by family and complete family by love. As a film characterized as children's comedy, the director cleverly increased the role of the minions, making the whole film more interesting and enjoyable!

title: Missing and striving is the epitaph of love and youth
review: It's easy to meet, but it's hard to meet again. Body exchange is not a new subject, but the film is still moving. Everyone in a period of life, always believe that they will meet a person who is destined to meet. Even we don't know who he is, but still believe that we will meet each. This kind of 'belief' that most of us have already given up, so we will go to the movies to see the male and female owners whether they give up or not.

title: Every girl deserves respect
review: The adaptation of the film was quite successful. In the film, Mulan joined the army for her father. Filial piety to her father is the cause of the story, but not the ultimate goal. The significance of joining the army is to find the most real self. The truth is very important for both boys and girls, and also an opportunity for Mulan to prove her ability. Success only cares for those who work hard, regardless of gender.

title: Good
review: People are always afraid of loneliness. He wake others up, because he is afraid of living alone. He lied, because he is afraid of losing. He sacrifice himself, because he loves her.

title: Try to change
review: We may have evolved, but deep down we are still animals. Prejudice, discrimination, evaluation, using stereotypes to frame others in a small frame, just for their own easy. So try to prove that you are right, but don't want others to label you. Life is a little crazy, we often make mistakes. Whatever you are, change starts with you.

title: Always personal heroism
review: The greatness of this kind of movie is not in the movie itself, but in 'This movie is adapted from the true story.' But I don't like its way to tell a story. All the thrills are quite deliberate, and there is always a thrill 0.01 seconds. I can't tell whether it is bad or not, but this neatly mediocre is the difficult to accept.

title: The girl's acting is great
review: If you swallow your voice, you will be plundered even more. I surprised by the little girl's acting skills and interpret her ruthlessness very well. And the unveiling of the secret really scared me. But the plot is general. There are a lot of bugs in the latter half.

title: Grow up unconsciously
review: There are many shocking scenes. Believe everything, then you can see the beauty of fantasy. The process of life is to keep putting it down. 'I thought it would turn back, but it just looked deep into the forest and disappeared forever. Maybe my father was right. He didn't treat me as a friend at all, but I'm sure that what I saw in his eyes was not just the reflection of my own vision. It will not go back, but in my heart, it will always be with me. ' Maybe that's growth.

title: Exquisite and moving
review: Even through the treachery of evil, death has not taken away her sweet innocence. Love is very simple. You don't have to cross life and death. As long as the other person is in your heart, love will last forever. I'll never forget Emily standing at the church door and turning into butterflies. So moving.

title: Warm but trivial
review: A story of emotional trouble relies on another story of healing, very funny and very inspirational, dancing can be said to be very bloody, but the plot is a bit trivial and clichÃ©, the ending is a bit fake.

title: touching
review: 'It's impossible to forget what happened. It's just that you can't remember it.' Sometimes, The innocence and kindness of children can wash away the greed of adults.

title: Marvellous character creation
review:
The image and the sound of the dialogue reflect the helplessness of 'No Country for Old Men'. You spent so much time trying to recapture the deprived things, but
always found that you lost more.

title: A word: cool!
review: The highlight moment of the small person, perfectly interpreting the violent aesthetics. Anti-logic and bad taste will always be a magic weapon for trial and error.

title: Death is not farewell, forgetting is
review: Movies are great dream machines. Those families who can't go back to their hometown and those people we can't protect are only can be met in our dreams. Family is so important that can never be erased from the heart.

title: Now he belongs to eternity
review: Glad to see there is such a film that no longer focuses on the epic narrative pattern, but returns to the interpretation of character shaping and the spirit of the times. This tragic history is laid by those who are upright, introspective, courageous, and politically wise.

title: Cute
review: The plot is just so-so, but the Baymax is so cute. Many people have such a person in their lives. He brings you the most precious and beautiful memories in life. When he leaves, the whole soul seems to be hollowed out. Some people finally choose to be just as beautiful as him, and they have courage to keep going.

title: touching but the plot is a bit cliché
review: 'Stay true to your heart and chase true love', putting this theme in the transition of the mother's understanding of the estrangement of the daughter is particularly moving. However, as a cartoon, the meaning is not enough, the story is thin.

title: Sweet but not so touching
review: Now, watch this movie again, the education of several children in the film is too typical, but not so touching. But fairytale factories, crooked Charlie's houses and independent dentist's offices in the snow are all sweet.

title: Warm and funny
review: Like all the fathers who love their children, Dracula has tried everything to protect her daughter. This kind of affection doesn't ask for return, but does everything. I was very moved when I saw the movie. Although the plot was a little old-fashioned, the story was moving and funny.

title: Incredible magic
review: In this world, it is only the people you love that you don't need to identify the so-called truth and falsehood. There are many ways to describe life. The truth may be the most boring and unacceptable. So people who paint rainbow colors on the outside of their lives deserve respect and trust because of their love.

title: Fabulous
review: Musicals and movies are perfectly integrated. Awe of suffering is like cherishing the deeper and deeper lines on the face of your lover.

title: Pursue courage and kindness
review: If nature gives civilization vitality, then greed will seize the vitality of civilization until it is destroyed. 'Barus' is not so much the destruction of lapda as the rebirth of lapda civilization.

title: Crazy and great always follow closely
review: When greed and desire are the driving force, money and success will become the only faith. The soundtrack is very special, which strengthens the film's sense of urgency. Daniel's performance is unforgettable. The desolate background enlarges the greed of the protagonist.

title: Perfect
review: Fear Can Hold You Prisoner, Hope Can Set You Free. Some people's wings are so bright that even the darkest prison in the world cannot encircle them for a long time. This film tells a simple story, a redemption, in exchange for freedom. Besides the belief drive him to do so. This film is moving, it also makes many people grow up.

title: Funny
review: Family, love, adventure, adoration, inspiration, almost all of them are reflected in this movie.There are funny and moving parts to the plot. But on the whole, the content of plot innovation is not much, which made it similar to most adventure and funny films.
